ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste

cookingTips: Cut carrots evenly lengthwise or into batons for consistent cooking
Toss with oil and garlic salt before roasting
Add Parmesan in final 5 minutes to keep it from burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through cutting and seasoning techniques to ensure tender carrots with a golden exterior.
